channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Fantastic Flavours
channel.desc: Nordic: Ainsley's inspiration this time comes from the flavours of Nordic cuisine as Lisa Snowdon heads to a popular bakery and Brian Conley has a quick cooking lesson with Ainsley. S2 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Racing
channel.desc: Oli Bell presents racing from Ascot, Newmarket and Haydock - Ascot takes centre stage with the 2025 Shergar Cup featuring 12 top riders from around the world in the team event.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Deal or No Deal
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a special edition as reality TV legend Sam Thompson takes on the Banker supported by his friends, his family, and a few famous faces.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Ortis Deley, Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock, Graeme Hall and Sarah Millican take on the challenge in the hope of winning thousands of pounds for their charities. S12 Ep9.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The 1% Club
channel.desc: Find out how clever you are as Lee Mack presents the quiz where it doesn't matter how good you are at quizzes and where 100 contestants could win up to 100,000 pounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: No Time to Die
channel.desc: Bond film starring Daniel Craig and Ana de Armas, 2021. 007 has left active service, but his peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter turns up asking him for help with a new mission.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Suspicion
channel.desc: Unmasked: The final episode of the psychological mystery thriller series. Leo's countdown begins as Cresswell's past leads Vanessa and Scott to uncover the truth. S1 Ep8.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: English Football League Highlights
channel.desc: Action from the day's games in the Football League including Sheffield United v Bristol City, Southampton v Wrexham, Coventry City v Hull City, and Charlton Athletic v Watford.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Fantastic Flavours
channel.desc: Nordic: Ainsley's inspiration this time comes from the flavours of Nordic cuisine as Lisa Snowdon heads to a popular bakery and Brian Conley has a quick cooking lesson with Ainsley. S2 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Twelve
channel.desc: Drama series exploring the lives and loves of 12 ordinary citizens at a murder trial. The trial gets more complex as the Crown calls Claire's best friend Amita to the stand. S1 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: Dougie has a shocking shark encounter in a shipwreck a week before the tiger shark dive, and there is a storm at sea while the team are diving with Caribbean reef sharks. S1 Ep4.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Great British Adventure
channel.desc: Snowdonia: James' adventure brings him over the border into north Wales as he is joined by chef Stephen Terry for a leg that includes a stop at Pale Hall. S1 Ep4.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
channel.desc: James is back in the kitchen and is serving up a feast for model Jodie Kidd while also enjoying recipes from chefs Aktar Islam, Emily Scott, and Corrin Harrison. S8 Ep19.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Katie is joined by Rachel Parris to try pond dipping, Michael and Gen transform a charity advocate, and JJ Goodman serves up more delicious drinks. S1 Ep17.

channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
channel.desc: Joining Alan this time are broadcaster Katie Derham, Major Bellamy himself - that's actor Simon Williams - a herd of alpacas and a Simon Lycett floral display.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
channel.desc: Vinegar and Avocados: Chef Tom Kerridge is in Andalucia to discover the secrets behind sherry vinegar, a regional speciality, and trendy avocados before celebrating the ingredients. S1 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Coastal Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh explores the coastal garden by looking back at three Love Your Garden episodes featuring memories of a Mediterranean garden, a Croatian coastal escape and more. S1 Ep5.

channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.title: Ninja Warrior UK
channel.desc: It's The Eliminator - only the toughest competitors who complete the course against the clock will survive, but who will go through to the Grand Final? S5 Ep7.

channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: Dougie has a shocking shark encounter in a shipwreck a week before the tiger shark dive, and there is a storm at sea while the team are diving with Caribbean reef sharks. S1 Ep4.

channel.title: For Your Eyes Only
channel.desc: Bond film starring Roger Moore and Carole Bouquet, 1981. 007 searches for a vital communication device that gives its bearer unlimited control over Britain's nuclear submarines.

channel.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen host as four new stars - Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Culculoglu, Shaun Wright-Phillips and Kelly Hoppen - cook for their loved ones with their mentors. S5 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ridley
